channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Researchers are rushing to build AI-powered robots. But will they work?

item.title: Oklahomans survey devastation after hundreds of homes are destroyed and damaged by wildfires
Rwanda severs ties with Belgium over 'neo-colonial delusions'
item.description: In a strongly worded statement, Rwanda accuses Belgium of "lies and manipulation".

item.title: What is Tren de Aragua, the Venezuelan gang targeted by Trump?
item.description: The gang began in a prison and is estimated to have thousands of members across eight countries.

item.title: What is the 1798 law that Trump used to deport migrants?
item.description: The wartime Alien Enemies Act has been controversially used to deport Venezuelans to a mega-jail in El Salvador.

item.title: Heat can age you as much as smoking, a new study finds
item.description: Exposure to heat can alter the way your DNA works, according to a new study. The effects could lead to long-term health outcomes.
